Title: Relates to the compensation for injury or damage caused by the intoxication or impairment of ability of a person under the age of twenty-one years
Summary: Relates to the compensation for injury or damage caused by the intoxication or impairment of ability of a person under the age of twenty-one years; defines impairment of ability.
LawCode: Amd ยง11-100, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to the compensation for injury or damage caused by the intoxication or impairment of ability of a person under the age of twenty-one years
